title: [娱乐|机制|汉化][HAYO]ChangeSkin - 改变你的皮肤吧，亮瞎别人的眼睛[1.8~1.11]
author: mangiare
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 12:12 编辑 
官方图





图片.png (37.61 KB, 下载次数: 5)

下载附件

2017-2-19 14:09 上传








搬运授权




搬运授权.jpg (33.26 KB, 下载次数: 5)

下载附件

2017-2-21 20:35 上传








作者的话
Description
This plugin allows your players to change their skins by command. These skins have to be downloaded from Mojang, because Minecraft clients only accept from Mojang signed skins. But you can choose every skin that another minecraft user currently has.

Moreover it will be possible to set a custom standard skin. If you want to, this plugin can set this standard skin for all players who still have the default steve or alex skin.


他可以做什么

·自定义你的皮肤√
·变成你偶像的皮肤√
·装逼√



特点

·轻量且好用
·皮肤即时更新
·容易使用
·几乎没有Mojang限制缓存
·不需要客户买正版
·可以创建一个标准的皮肤



命令

/setskin <uuid> --把你的皮肤设置为玩家的皮肤ID

/setskin <player> --官方没有介绍

/setskin <onlinePlayer> <newSkinUUID> <newSkinPlayerName>
 --貌似是设置一个皮肤

/skinupdate
 --从Mojang更新皮肤




权限

changeskin.command.skinupdate  --允许用
命令来刷新自己的皮肤
changeskin.command.setskin.*  --允许使用下面所有的命令
changeskin.command.setskin  --允许设定你自己的皮肤
changeskin.command.setskin.other  --允许设置其他玩家的皮肤



更新日志

2017.2.19 --开始汉化
2017.2.19 --汉化完毕
2017.2.19 --发帖子



作者的更新日志

2014.5.28  --第一次测试
2014.6.1 --测试成功
2015.2.1 --加入命令/skin update
2016.12.31 --加入版本1.11
2017.1.31 --弃坑
2017.2.19  --再次更新



原贴下载




ChangeSkin.jar
(329.89 KB, 下载次数: 992)



2017-2-19 14:24 上传
点击文件名下载附件
85%汉化版








汉化文件

# ChangeSkin locale
# You can access the newest locale here:
# https://github.com/games647/ChangeSkin/blob/master/core/src/main/resources/messages.yml

# In order to split a message into seperate lines you could just make a new line, but keep the '
# Example:
# bla: '&aFirst line
# Second line
# Third line'

# If you want to disable a message, you can just set it to a empty value.
# In this case no message will be sent
# Example:
# bla: ''

# Cooldown is activated and the user typed in the changeskin command too fast
cooldown: '&4请稍等，您不能更换皮肤这么快'

# Specific skin permissions are activated and the user doesn't have the permission for the supplied skin
no-permission: "&4你没有权限设置这个皮肤"

# User has no permission to set the skin of other players
no-permission-other: '&4没有权限改变其他皮肤'

# User wanted to set the skin of another player who isn't online
not-online: "&4此玩家不在线/正版"

# The command invoker just invoked /changeskin, but didn't supplied to the target skin
no-skin: '&4你必须提供你想改变皮肤的ID'

# Only players can have ingame skins
no-console: '&4你必须是一个玩家设置自己的皮肤'

# UUID resolve request was sent to the mojang servers and is waiting for a response
queue-name-resolve: '&6uuid解决排队的名字[233]'

# Supplied username is cannot be resolved because of connection problems
no-resolve: "&4uuid解决排队的名字[233]"

# UUID was successfull resolved
uuid-resolved: '&2UUID是成功解决的玩家的名字'

# Skin preferences was reset to the default value
reset: '&2已重置为默认值'

# Queuing skin change
skin-change-queue: '&6您的皮肤改变'

# The supplied UUID is not in the correct format Example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000
invalid-uuid: '&2无效的UUID'

# Skin is downloading form the mojang servers
skin-downloading: '&2皮肤正在下载'

# Instant updates was disabled, so the players have to relogin
skin-changed-no-instant: '&2皮肤改变。Relogin看到更改'

# Skin was successfull updates
skin-changed: '&2You received a new skin'

# On name to username rate-limiting
rate-limit: '&4名字UUID限速。请稍等一段时间或者提交你的目标的uuid的皮肤'

# On name to username and the username is not premium
not-premium: '&4这不是支付帐户的用户名'

# User cannot request a skin update if the user doesn't have one
dont-have-skin: "&4你没有一个皮肤使皮肤无效"

# Invalidate request is sent to the database and mojang
invalidate-request: '&2无效请求发送'

# The skin of another was updated
# This message is sent to the invoker of the command if it's not the same person
skin-updated: '&2皮肤更新的目标'

# User tried to upload a new skin, but it misses the skin url and optionally save name
upload-noargs: '&4不懂'

# There are no configured accounts to upload skins
no-accounts: '&4没有配置账户上传皮肤'

# User entered an invalid url for upload a skin
no-valid-url: '&4url开头必须是http或https'

# A new skin was successful uploaded, downloaded to the database and reverted to the old skin
# {0} represents the uuid of account which was used for uploading
# {1} represents the saved skin name into the database
skin-uploaded: '&2一个新的皮肤上传使用 {0} 并且保存在{1}'

# All accounts currently have cooldown. This is set to one minute per account because of rate-limiting from Mojang
accounts-cooldown: '&4每个账户目前有冷却时间'

# User tried to upload a new skin, but it misses the skin url and optionally save name
select-noargs: '&4皮肤ID是失踪[233]'

# User tried to choose a skin from an invalid skin name
invalid-skin-name: '&4无效的皮肤的名字'

# User tried to select a custom skin by it's id, but it wasn't found
skin-not-found: '&4没有找到皮肤'
复制代码

replies.txt_content:
mangiare 发表于 2017-3-17 17:31
群组服的话，你可以创建个服，例如Bukkit，然后把插件装在里面，如果你想登录大厅装这个插件的话，直接装 ...
对不起，我所有服务端全部安装了，输入指令无效。changeskin启动时依然提示要我在bungeecore上面安装。
估计是没配置好，bc端生成的文件比子服多一个message.yml文件。
请帮忙看一下配置，谢谢
配置文件中关于bc的配置如下:
# Only relevant for BungeeCord
# Here you can ignore certain servers in order to make use of lazy loading -> load the player data only
# if they are on the allowed servers
#
# This can be used against bot attacks
# If this is empty, nothing will be ignored
server-blacklist: []
# Lists are created like this:
#server-blacklist:
#    - pvp
#    - lobby

# Actually I don't want that you put your credentials here, but it seems there is no easier way to do it.
# See my statement here: https://www.spigotmc.org/threads ... age-15#post-1736265
#
# You can follow this guide on how to upload and use a skin:
# https://www.spigotmc.org/threads ... age-19#post-1792019
#
# Example:
# upload-accounts:
#     - EMAIL:PASSWORD
#     - EMAIL:PASSWORD
upload-accounts: []

# If you have a BungeeCord server, this option might be relevant for you.
# If you activate this option, the permission will be checked on the bukkit server and only on the bukkit server.
#
# This requires to install the plugin on the bukkit server too in order to send the response to the bungeecord server
#
# You still have to give the users the permission on the BungeeCord server in order to execute the command, but the bukkit
# server will verify if the user has the permissions on the backend server too.
bukkit-permissions: false

# This automatically refetches the skin from Mojang if the skin is older than x minutes
# This value should be at least one minute, because that's the rate-limit by Mojang
# -1 disables it
auto-skin-update: -1

# Database configuration
# Warning: If you use BungeeCord, you should switch to MySQL, because BungeeCord has only a driver for MySQL
storage:
# Single file SQLite database
    driver: org.sqlite.JDBC
    # File location
    database: '{pluginDir}/ChangeSkin.db'

# MySQL
#    driver: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
#    host: localhost
#    port: 3306
#    database: ChangeSkin
#    username: myUser
#    password: myPassword
